columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener.

columns.name: accelerator_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of parent accelerator.

columns.name: client_affinity
columns.description: Client affinity setting for the listener.

columns.name: port_ranges
columns.description: The list of port ranges for the connections from clients to the accelerator.

columns.name: protocol
columns.description: The protocol for the connections from clients to the accelerator.
